speakerBioSummary.text:
• Maye Musk is a role model, trend maker, and rule changer with a fascinating family.
  • Maye is a respected dietitian with two Master of Science degrees, who gives talks all over the world about health, nutrition, aging, gender equality, single parenting, overcoming challenges, confidence, and health to corporations, associations, hospitals, and universities.
  • Her book, A Woman Makes A Plan, is an international best-seller, and in over 100 countries and 30 languages with more to come.
  • But things were not always so easy or glamorous-- Maye became a single mom at thirty-one years old, struggling through poverty to provide for her three children; dealt with weight issues as a plus-size model, and overcame ageism in the modeling industry. 
  • She established a lifelong career as a dietitian, all the while starting over in eight different cities across three countries and two continents.
  • Maye is an active participant with the non-profit Big Green, which supports USA schools, families and communities to grow their own food through training, grants and garden bed donations.

speakerBiography.text:
Maye Musk is an international author, dietitian, supermodel, and speaker. She has reached success in the past 50+ years in the nutrition and modeling fields. Her book, A Woman Makes A Plan, is an international best-seller, published in 100+ countries and translated into 30+ languages, with more coming soon. 

Maye has run her own nutrition business for over 45 years in eight cities and three countries through speaking, consulting, counseling, writing, and media work. She has peaked in her field in three countries: the first Representative of the Consulting Dietitians of Southern Africa; President of the Consulting Dietitians of Canada; and Chair of the Entrepreneurs Nutrition, Academy of Dietetics and Nutrition. She also won the Outstanding Nutrition Entrepreneur Award in the USA. 

She was the first dietitian featured on a cereal box with her book, Feel Fantastic, published in 1996 and now out of print. Her new book, A Woman Makes A Plan, will make you Feel Fantastic, so the motivation continues…. Maye has been modeling since the age of 15. She has had four billboards in Times Square in her 60s, probably a record. In her late 60s, she was the oldest Covergirl. Now at 74, she is a Dior Beauty ambassador. And, at long last, there’s a Supermodel who travels the world doing high-fashion campaigns.

She continues to give presentations on entrepreneurship, aging, equality, single parenting, overcoming challenges, confidence, and health to corporations, associations, hospitals, and universities. Maye is an active participant with the non-profit Big Green, which supports USA schools, families and communities to grow their own food through training, grants and garden bed donations

That’s why, as Maye says, #ItsGreatToBe74
